pages.text: I have heard it said that Chromium spikes 'might steal destiny...', in my experience, they seem to affect one's luck. $(p)Like all hemalurgic spikes, the effect of a chromium spike depends on the donor, though in a different way to iron, for example: $(p)If the donor is a Rabbit, or completely White cat, the recipient would become 75%%, or 35%% luckier, respectively. $(p)In contrast, if the donor is a black cat, wither skeleton, or pufferfish, the recipient's luck would decrease, by 100%%, 55%%, or 5%%, respectively
